paper_abstract: We describe a new algorithm for the problem of perfect sorting a signed permutation by reversals. The worst-case time complexity of this algorithm is parameterized by the maximum prime degree d of the strong interval tree, i.e., f(d).n(O(1)). This improves the best known algorithm which complexity was based on a parameter always larger than or equal to d. (C) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A more efficient algorithm for perfect sorting by reversals
